events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a roadside barrier on April 28th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verification of keywords relating to car collision.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the customer's auto accident claim for better assistance.
Customer received acknowledgment of their claim submission, ensuring the process has officially started.
The claims department requested photos of the vehicle damage and police report related to the accident.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including the damage photos and official accident report.
An investigation into the circumstances of the collision has begun, with agents reviewing submitted evidence.
Investigation finished confirming the vehicle damage was due to the described auto accident without negligence.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover vehicle repairs according to the insurance policy limits.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely communication from the agent.
Final approval of the auto accident claim granted following customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Insurance payment issued to customer for vehicle repair costs as per approved settlement agreement.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation from customer.
All documentation and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
